d:
Lopunny wants an egg with a move only Lucario can pass down, but he’s uninterested—she’s too soft for his liking. Maybe, with the strength of a Mega Stone, she can show him that she’s more than a worthy mate.

Story & Story board by Lummh
Illustrated by Akiione

New page every 4 Fridays, or already avalaible on Patreon/SubscribeStar
Up to 4 extra pages available if you choose to support this comic directly.
